body_html:
Update:

I've replaced tf.nn.expand_dims() with alternative function

shape1 = self.embedded_chars.get_shape().as_list()
print(shape1)
dim = shape[1:]
dim = [-1] + dim + [1]
self.embedded_chars_expanded = tf.reshape(self.embedded_chars, dim)
shape2 = self.embedded_chars_expanded.get_shape().as_list()
print(shape2)

Both shapes are now (None, 40, 300, 1) as required. Model trains and does inference fine but during conversion to .tflite new error pops up.

RuntimeError: TOCO failed see console for info. 2018-08-19 22:13:20.177661: I tensorflow/contrib/lite/toco/graph_transformations/graph_transformations.cc:39] Before Removing unused ops: 31 operators, 48 arrays (0 quantized) 2018-08-19 22:13:20.189193: I tensorflow/contrib/lite/toco/graph_transformations/graph_transformations.cc:39] Before general graph transformations: 31 operators, 48 arrays (0 quantized) 2018-08-19 22:13:20.192098: F tensorflow/contrib/lite/toco/graph_transformations/propagate_fixed_sizes.cc:442] Check failed: input_flat_size >= product_non_wildcard_dims (300 vs. 12000)Array not large enough to fill the requested dimensions for Reshape op with output "embedding/Reshape". Are your input shapes correct?

@aselle Would you please take a look at this?

body:
Update:

I've replaced tf.nn.expand_dims() with alternative function

`
shape1 = self.embedded_chars.get_shape().as_list()
`
`print(shape1)`
`dim = shape[1:]`
`dim = [-1] + dim + [1]`
`self.embedded_chars_expanded = tf.reshape(self.embedded_chars, dim)`
`shape2 = self.embedded_chars_expanded.get_shape().as_list()`
`print(shape2)`

Both shapes are now (None, 40, 300, 1) as required. Model trains and does inference fine but during conversion to .tflite new error pops up.

`
RuntimeError: TOCO failed see console for info.
2018-08-19 22:13:20.177661: I tensorflow/contrib/lite/toco/graph_transformations/graph_transformations.cc:39] Before Removing unused ops: 31 operators, 48 arrays (0 quantized)
2018-08-19 22:13:20.189193: I tensorflow/contrib/lite/toco/graph_transformations/graph_transformations.cc:39] Before general graph transformations: 31 operators, 48 arrays (0 quantized)
2018-08-19 22:13:20.192098: F tensorflow/contrib/lite/toco/graph_transformations/propagate_fixed_sizes.cc:442] Check failed: input_flat_size >= product_non_wildcard_dims (300 vs. 12000)Array not large enough to fill the requested dimensions for Reshape op with output "embedding/Reshape". Are your input shapes correct?
`

@aselle Would you please take a look at this?
